location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 13; these numbers are written in pencil and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: This file consists of correspondence to and from Sir Clarmont Skrine in his capacity as Counsellor for Indian Affairs, British Embassy, Tehran. The correspondence mainly regards arranging travel and accommodation for Skrine.

name.namePart: British Embassy, Counsellor for Indian Affairs
